com.konakart.actions.gateways

Class CommideaVanguardBaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.konakart.actions.BaseAction
        • com.konakart.actions.gateways.BaseGatewayAction
          • com.konakart.actions.gateways.CommideaVanguardBaseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommideaVanguard1Action, CommideaVanguard2Action, CommideaVanguardAction

    public class CommideaVanguardBaseAction
extends BaseGatewayAction
    This class is a Base Action class for sending the Generate Session Request to Commidea. It contains methods that manage the various messages that are sent to Commidea.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • vggeneratesessionrequest

        protected java.lang.String vggeneratesessionrequest(KKAppEng kkAppEng,
                                                    com.konakart.appif.OrderIf order,
                                                    com.konakart.appif.IpnHistoryIf ipnHistory)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that manages the VGGENERATESESSIONREQUEST and the VGGENERATESESSIONRESPONSE. The method places the following data in the custom fields of the PaymentDetails object so that they can be picked up by the JSP that posts the credit card details to Commidea.
        • Custom1 - sessionguid + ";" + processingDB
        • Custom2 - sessionpasscode
        • Custom4 - ccDetailPostUrl
        Parameters:
        kkAppEng - the kkAppEng
        order - the order
        ipnHistory - the ipnHistory
        Returns:
        Returns the Commidea error code
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • vggetcarddetailsrequest

        protected java.lang.String vggetcarddetailsrequest(KKAppEng kkAppEng,
                                                   com.konakart.appif.OrderIf order,
                                                   com.konakart.appif.IpnHistoryIf ipnHistory)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that manages the VGGETCARDDETAILSREQUEST and the VGGETCARDDETAILSRESPONSE.
        Parameters:
        kkAppEng - the kkAppEng
        order - the order
        ipnHistory - the ipnHistory
        Returns:
        Returns "1" or "0" depending on whether the authentication enrollment check request should be made. i.e. Should be "0" for AMEX cards
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • vgpayerauthenrollmentcheckrequest

        protected java.lang.String vgpayerauthenrollmentcheckrequest(KKAppEng kkAppEng,
                                                             com.konakart.appif.OrderIf order,
                                                             com.konakart.appif.IpnHistoryIf ipnHistory)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that manages the VGPAYERAUTHENROLLMENTCHECKREQUEST and the VGPAYERAUTHENROLLMENTCHECKRESPONSE. The method places the following data in the custom fields of the PaymentDetails object.
        • Custom2 - payerauthrequestid
        • Custom3 - acsurl
        • Custom4 - pareq
        • Custom5 - TermUrl
        Parameters:
        kkAppEng - the kkAppEng
        order - the order
        ipnHistory - the ipnHistory
        Returns:
        Returns the Commidea error code if there is an error, otherwise returns "Y" or "N" depending whether the customer is enrolled or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • vgpayerauthauthenticationcheckrequest

        protected java.lang.String vgpayerauthauthenticationcheckrequest(KKAppEng kkAppEng,
                                                                 com.konakart.appif.OrderIf order,
                                                                 com.konakart.appif.IpnHistoryIf ipnHistory,
                                                                 java.lang.String paRes,
                                                                 java.lang.String enrolled)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that manages the VGPAYERAUTHAUTHENTICATIONCHECKREQUEST and the VGPAYERAUTHAUTHENTICATIONCHECKRESPONSE.
        Parameters:
        kkAppEng - the kkAppEng
        order - the order
        ipnHistory - the ipnHistory
        paRes - the paRes
        enrolled - the enrolled
        Returns:
        Returns the Commidea error code if there is an error, otherwise returns "Y" or "N" or some other value depending whether the customer was authenticated or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

        protected java.lang.String vgtransactionrequest(KKAppEng kkAppEng,

                                         throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
